idea-plugin.name: Pre Commit Hook Plugin
idea-plugin.description: Create a file named "pre-commit-hook.sh" in project root, The plugin will run the hook before any commit with the file changed as arguments.
idea-plugin.change-notes: 0.1 - Pre Commit Hook Handler Initial Commit 0.2 - Added Progress Indicator 0.3 - Added Skip Buttons 0.3.1 - Fixed null pointer when committing a deleted file 0.4.0 - Added possibility to configure a path to a script 0.4.1 - Fixed running non-windows script on windows (python, perl, etc.)
